description: Scott is talking with his team captain AJ about his performance issues and AJ won't let him back on the field because of his lack of motivation and poor skills. Begging to be let back on the team Scott will do anything for the team captain. AJ is worried about his reputation but the offer is making his cock twitch underneath his mesh shorts. Scott can't wait any longer for an answer so he decides to move in on AJ and finally he gives into his temptations as long as everything is kept secret. Soon all hell breaks loose and AJ takes control of that ass and mouth. Scott is at the team captain's mercy as he bends him over and takes his bubbly ass. I guess we all will see just how bad Scott wants to be on the team. Enjoy!
title: Making The Team
